name: Mailure
description:
Description:
You play a naughty boy at school who always fails at exams. So the principal of his school decided to send a mail to his mother, but sending one mail is not enough because the boy may steal it from the postman. So the principal decides to send lots of mails till the boy's mother calls the principal.

This game is made for the Experimental GamePlay Failure theme and for 2BeeGames compo.

Controls:

  • Arrows: Move
  • X: Attack
  • Z: Release Dogs
  • C: get items from unconcious person
  • Up: interact with the enviroment
